document_data.mainbody:
Animalistic power was an arcane and divine conjuration spell from the fourth and fifth circles of magic that dealt electricity damage to two objects within range. The spell could be used by druids, sorcerers, wizards, warmages, and wu jen.
The spell could be cast on two creatures within  from the caster, and the spells distance increased with the casters magical proficiency. When the spell was discharged, it instantaneously connected two creatures with a bolt of electricity, affecting their natural conductivity. The power of the blast of electricity grew with the casters magical skills.
The spell required a verbal, somatic, and material components. Its material components were two small rods of iron.
